participant_1.background:
I've been single for a while now, but I'm looking forward to finding someone to share my life with.
i like to listen to country music.
I'm going to go shopping and test drive my new car.
I take a walk in the canyon before starting my work.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.

participant_2.background:
I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.
i do not drink alcohol.
I want to make sure all my files are properly named and organized so I can find them easily when I need them.
i like eating pretzels.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Hello, my day is going well. Thank you for asking. How is your day going?
It is going well, thank you for asking. I am excited to go shopping and test drive my new car.
That sounds exciting! I am not much of a shopper, but I do enjoy going for walks.
That is fair enough. I take a walk in the canyon before starting my work. I enjoy the peace and quiet.
I can understand that. I like to go for walks in the park. It is a nice way to relax and clear my head.
What do you do for work?
I am an artist. I work from home and I love it. I have a lot of creative freedom and I can set my own hours.
That sounds like a great job. I am glad you enjoy it.
Thank you. I am very lucky to have it.
What kind of art do you create?
I create paintings and sculptures. I also do some graphic design work.
That is amazing. I would love to see some of your work sometime.
I would be happy to show you. I have an online gallery that you can visit.
I will check it out. It sounds amazing.
Thank you. I am glad you think so.
I am going to go now. It was nice talking to you.
It was nice talking to you too. Have a good day.
